subject-header.title: subject-header field schema
subject-header.description: subject-header field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.56

_ui._content:
Subject Metadata Template

The purpose of this template is to describe the subject information for about the individual subjects (animals) for which the data was recorded. Some metadata fields here are based on the brain imaging data structure (BIDS) specifications to describe participants.

This template is further divided into 3 different sections:

  1. General Metadata:  This section is intended to provide general information about the subject such as the sex, species, identifier, etc.
  2. Training Metadata: This section is to be used if the animal was trained on a specific task before recording of the data.
  3. Surgery Metadata: This section is to be used to provide information on the surgeries done on the subject. Please consider using multiple entries in this section and the field 'surgery type' to describe all the surgeries that were performed, such as 'head post implantation,' 'array implantation,' etc.
